faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about InfraUX
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know to start transforming your cloud infrastructure

items.question: What is InfraUX and what makes it special?
items.answer: InfraUX is a revolutionary visual platform for designing, generating, and deploying cloud infrastructure. It combines the power of visual design with advanced AI (Zenix AI) to transform how you work with infrastructure. We offer a generous free plan and premium plans with advanced features.

items.question: What's the difference between the free and paid plans?
items.answer: Free Plan: Perfect for personal projects with 1 project, 3 diagrams, 20 resources, and 5 Zenix AI trials. Paid Plans: Starting at $299/user/month with unlimited projects, unlimited Zenix AI, team collaboration, priority support, and enterprise features.

items.question: What does Zenix AI include?
items.answer: Zenix AI is our integrated AI assistant that helps you design optimal architectures, generate perfect IaC code, detect security issues, and optimize costs. The free plan includes 5 trial uses, and paid plans include unlimited usage.

items.question: Which cloud providers does InfraUX support?
items.answer: InfraUX supports the three major cloud providers: Amazon Web Services (AWS), Google Cloud Platform (GCP), and Microsoft Azure. You can design multi-cloud architectures and generate Terraform, CloudFormation, or Pulumi code.

items.question: Can I change plans anytime?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade or change your plan anytime from your dashboard. Changes apply immediately and are prorated. If you cancel, you maintain access until the end of your current billing period.

items.question: Is it safe to use InfraUX with my infrastructure?
items.answer: Absolutely. Our cloud version complies with SOC 2, GDPR, and the highest security standards. We never store your cloud credentials.
